mapper.sql: CONTACT_ID, CUSTOMER_ID, CONTACT_NAME, ENGLISH_NAME, JOB, DEPARTMENT, MOBILEPHONE, OFFICE_PHONE, EMAIL, ADDRESS, NOTE_INFORMATION, COMPANY_ID, LAST_MODIFY_DATE
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from XS_CUSTOMER_CONTACT
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into XS_CUSTOMER_CONTACT (CONTACT_ID, CUSTOMER_ID, CONTACT_NAME, ENGLISH_NAME, JOB, DEPARTMENT, MOBILEPHONE, OFFICE_PHONE, EMAIL, ADDRESS, NOTE_INFORMATION, COMPANY_ID, LAST_MODIFY_DATE) values (#{contactId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{customerId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{englishName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{job,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobilephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{officePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{noteInformation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lastModifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into XS_CUSTOMER_CONTACT
CONTACT_ID,
CUSTOMER_ID,
CONTACT_NAME,
ENGLISH_NAME,
JOB,
DEPARTMENT,
MOBILEPHONE,
OFFICE_PHONE,
EMAIL,
ADDRESS,
NOTE_INFORMATION,
COMPANY_ID,
LAST_MODIFY_DATE,

mapper.update:
update XS_CUSTOMER_CONTACT
CONTACT_ID = #{record.contactId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CUSTOMER_ID = #{record.customerId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CONTACT_NAME = #{record.contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ENGLISH_NAME = #{record.englishName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JOB = #{record.job,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEPARTMENT = #{record.department,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MOBILEPHONE = #{record.mobilephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OFFICE_PHONE = #{record.officePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMAIL = #{record.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESS = #{record.address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NOTE_INFORMATION = #{record.noteInformation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANY_ID = #{record.companyId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_MODIFY_DATE = #{record.lastModifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update XS_CUSTOMER_CONTACT set CONTACT_ID = #{record.contactId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CUSTOMER_ID = #{record.customerId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CONTACT_NAME = #{record.contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENGLISH_NAME = #{record.englishName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JOB = #{record.job,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPARTMENT = #{record.department,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOBILEPHONE = #{record.mobilephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OFFICE_PHONE = #{record.officePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{record.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS = #{record.address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOTE_INFORMATION = #{record.noteInformation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPANY_ID = #{record.companyId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_MODIFY_DATE = #{record.lastModifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

update XS_CUSTOMER_CONTACT
CUSTOMER_ID = #{customerId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CONTACT_NAME = #{contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ENGLISH_NAME = #{englishName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JOB = #{job,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEPARTMENT = #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MOBILEPHONE = #{mobilephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OFFICE_PHONE = #{officePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NOTE_INFORMATION = #{noteInformation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANY_ID = #{companyId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_MODIFY_DATE = #{lastModifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where CONTACT_ID = #{contactId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update XS_CUSTOMER_CONTACT set CUSTOMER_ID = #{customerId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CONTACT_NAME = #{contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENGLISH_NAME = #{englishName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JOB = #{job,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPARTMENT = #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOBILEPHONE = #{mobilephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OFFICE_PHONE = #{officePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOTE_INFORMATION = #{noteInformation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPANY_ID = #{companyId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_MODIFY_DATE = #{lastModifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where CONTACT_ID = #{contactId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
